title: ABOUT
subtitle: The Engineer
bio: I am an Applied AI Engineer with a strong focus on Artificial Intelligence for Robotics and Autonomous Systems, combining academic training from Georgia Tech and UPenn.
My foundation bridges AI algorithms with hardware-aware, production-grade systems—a critical capability for edge AI and safety-critical applications.

highlights.title: Experience Highlights
items: FPGA Acceleration: Re-architected software-defined radio pipelines using custom floating-point formats.
Safety-Critical Control: Designed industrial laser systems with <2 μs emergency response.
